name: Flop City Gaiden [Part 1]
description:
Warning : Minor blood and violence

A Nanoreno 2020 visual novel

Follow the story of Sylvia Pardalis as she journeys into the forsaken city where the mad go to die, Flop City. All to find a certain person.

Witness as she deals with wacky hijinks as Flop City's inhabitants wreak havoc upon the streets as she attempts to get into the deeper parts of the city.

This is a semi-sequel to Flippety Floppity in Flop City, though you do not need to have played that game to understand the happenings of this one.

Features :-

- Only one ending, this is only part 1

- Fish

- Cute Girls

- Funny monsters

If you want to discuss more about the game or the rest of the Fishual Novel series, feel free to join the Fishual Discord through the invite link below :

https://discord.gg/S788fxE

I also have a twitter where you can follow me to keep up with development on Part 2 :

https://twitter.com/Kindvirus999

____________

Credits :-

Character art and writing by Kindvirus

Contains royalty free music from bensound.com and Debussy.

Backgrounds uses public domain images editted for non-commercial use.
